question: 戒める
sourceAnswer: to{} warn-against/caution-against | admonish/scold/rebuke | prohibit/forbid/ban | to-be:cautious | detest/loathe | punish
activeAnswer: to{} warn-against/caution-against | admonish/scold/rebuke | prohibit/forbid/ban | to-be:cautious | detest/loathe | punish
sourceMnemonic: I say my <kanji>commandment</kanji> in order <vocabulary>to warn</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>to caution</vocabulary> the people not to do bad things.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The first commandment I say <vocabulary>to warn</vocabulary> them of not doing bad things is <reading>I mash</reading> (<ja>いまし</ja>) my own potatoes. Nobody else mashes my potatoes. Got it?
